text.enText: Here and now, I want to sparkle so brightly

text.jpText: 叶えたい未来へ走り出そう
text.enText: Rushing headfirst into the future I desire so
My dream has only just begun

text.jpText: ライバルがいるほど頑張れるよ
text.enText: The more rivals I have, the harder I try

text.jpText: いつか手にしたい真剣勝負の栄光
text.enText: Someday, we'll have our chance\nSee what happens when we clash

text.jpText: どんな時でも笑いあえるよ
text.enText: No matter how hard either of us struggles

text.jpText: 君のココロにつながるシンパシー
text.enText: When our eyes finally meet\nWe smile with sympathy

text.jpText: 遠く離れてしまう時でも
text.enText: Even when our paths stray, pushing us away

text.jpText: いつまでも変わらないトキメキがあるから
text.enText: My fire remains, ready for the day when at last we can meet again!
Here and now, I want to sparkle so brightly

text.jpText: いつかは憧れも君も越えてゆくよ
text.enText: One of these days, I'll take that final step\nPast you and my hero

text.jpText: step by step もう止められない
text.enText: Step by step I go, no one can hinder me

text.jpText: specialな勝負で駆け抜けよう
text.enText: Our special bond and shared passion will help us go
